headline: Builders FirstSource Faces Weaker Results While Betting On Modular And Digital Tools
summary: Builders FirstSource reported weaker Q4 and full year results, with declines in sales and profitability. The company is cutting costs, consolidating facilities, and pushing productivity efforts in response to ongoing housing and commodity headwinds. Builders FirstSource recently acquired Pleasant Valley Homes, expanding its modular housing footprint to address affordability and labor constraints. For investors watching NYSE:BLDR, the mixed update comes after a 10.3% decline over the past...
